https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/hF1t6vtXUlTQE8lJgLpy1j2sn6P.jpg A small village in Nigeria without drinkable water, sustainable farming and fishing has one resource: oil. This story is based on true events; the violent havoc that ensued between the militants and government due to the oil corporations' greed, which had a ripple effect throughout the global oil industry. Blood & Oil
